name: Eldabyss 2
description:
The year is 3058. Humanity is dead, and has been replaced with a race of robots called Sybers.
You are Ebic Lamphart, a cloaked, sentient war robot.

After being buried after presumed dead by a goddess named Maikki, you burst out of your grave, and find your world invaded with demonic entities and corroded with rifts to the Underworld. Angered and driven, you brandish out your cross and proceed to dive head first into the mouth of Hell and its nine rings, ready to vanquish these beasts and save your home.

FEATURES

- A setting of the Nine Rings of Hell from Dante's Inferno and the Eldabyss universe
- Drawn inspiration from all your Y2K and '90s favorites
- REALLY fast paced platforming
- A large arsenal of badass guns
- Tense bossfights
- Secrets...
- Cinematic cutscenes
- And more!
